snippet: DASH--George B. Cherished husband of Deborah, father of Alexander, son of Bertha, brother of Debbie (Richard) and Harold (Vicky). Graduate of Cheltenham High School (Pennsylvania), Amherst College '74. Actor, singer, entrepreneur, Phillies fan, poker player, Coach. Contributions in his Memory should be sent to Trustees of Amherst College George B. Dash'74 Performing Arts Fund, PO Box 5000, Amherst, MA 01002. 1/3
lead_paragraph: DASH--George B. Cherished husband of Deborah, father of Alexander, son of Bertha, brother of Debbie (Richard) and Harold (Vicky). headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DASH, GEORGE B
